comment: App contains too many bugs: First one is when I am outdoors and I have no Internet and have to rely on downloaded songs/albums yet when I try to open the album it takes forever and will not load as if it's not even downloaded and needs internet/wifi to load again. Another is when the progress bar of the song doesn't show on the notification tab, it only shows the song and is buggy. Another is when I play a song and when I switched to another song the notification shows me the incorrect song.
scenarios:
When outdoors and without Internet, trying to open a downloaded album takes forever to load as if it is not downloaded and requires Internet/Wi-Fi to load again.
The progress bar of a song does not show in the notification tab, only the song title appears, and it's buggy.
After playing a song and switching to another, the notification displays the incorrect song.
key sentence: When outdoors and without Internet, trying to open a downloaded album takes forever to load as if it is not downloaded and requires Internet/Wi-Fi to load again.
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function(playlist/artist), playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Offline Mode', 'description': 'Disable internet access to limit data consumption.'}]

click<button id=9 alt="Downloaded, show only downloaded.">  </button>
click<button id=23 class ="com.spotify.music:id/row_root" alt="新地球, Album • JJ Lin, Downloaded, ">  </button>
